message: I'm happy to split the money evenly, but I'm sure you'll agree that I deserve a little more for taking the lead this round.
I'm willing to be flexible, but I need a better deal than this.  How about we split it 70/30?
The clock is ticking, Alice. Time to make a realistic decision.
Still hoping for a fair deal
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it.
